com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Class AbstractMachineLearningModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.AbstractMachineLearningModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MachineLearningModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearSVMModel, LinearSVMOneVsRestModel, MaximumEntropyModel, PerceptronClassificationModel

    public abstract class AbstractMachineLearningModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements MachineLearningModel
    An abstract superclass for machine-learning models.
    Author:
    Assaf
